alert.note: Alert for Genesee (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Genesee County through 715 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over central Genesee County. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding possible in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Batavia, Le Roy, Attica, Pavilion, Byron, Oakfield, Stafford, Elba, Alexander, East Bethany, East Pembroke and Bethany Center. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
